businessSemantics: Contains detailed information about various addresses including primary address lines, city, zip code, state, and country.
Holds information about courses including their names and descriptions.
Represents departments and the number of degree programs they offer.
joinSql: SELECT Departments.department_id, Departments.department_name, COUNT(Degree_Programs.degree_program_id) AS NumberOfDegrees FROM Departments JOIN Degree_Programs ON Departments.department_id = Degree_Programs.department_id GROUP BY Departments.department_id

businessSemantics: Links students to their enrolled degree programs and semesters.
joinSql: SELECT Student_Enrolment.*, Degree_Programs.degree_summary_name, Semesters.semester_name, Students.first_name, Students.last_name FROM Student_Enrolment JOIN Degree_Programs ON Student_Enrolment.degree_program_id = Degree_Programs.degree_program_id JOIN Semesters ON Student_Enrolment.semester_id = Semesters.semester_id JOIN Students ON Student_Enrolment.student_id = Students.student_id

businessSemantics: Contains details about course sections including their names and descriptions.
Represents transcripts and their contents, linking them to specific course enrollments.
joinSql: SELECT Transcripts.transcript_id, Transcripts.transcript_date, Transcript_Contents.student_course_id FROM Transcripts JOIN Transcript_Contents ON Transcripts.transcript_id = Transcript_Contents.transcript_id JOIN Student_Enrolment_Courses ON Transcript_Contents.student_course_id = Student_Enrolment_Courses.student_course_id
